鑲.definition: to inlay; to embed; ridge; border

鑲嵌.definition: to inlay; to embed; to set (e.g. a jewel in a ring); tiling; tesselation

鑲牙.definition: to have a false tooth set in; denture

鑲邊.definition: edge; border; to edge (with lace, embroidery etc)

鑲黃旗.definition: Bordered Yellow banner or Hövööt Shar khoshuu in Xilingol League 錫林郭勒盟|锡林郭勒盟[Xi1 lin2 guo1 le4 Meng2], Inner Mongolia
